trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around July 1st 2013
Object Flight Path: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting Detailsmonday,July 1,2013 it was about 8 PM,spotted the multiple objects at north hollywood, when i got out outside to smoke a cigarett, i heard helicopter flying really low,so i look up in a sky, and a minute later,when helicopter was gone, i spotted a solid deep black color object flying towards the van nuys, with no lights or anything,no sound,at first i thought it was a balloon, but it was flying faster than a ballon does, didnt look like a plane,or nothing,it look actually like something i'v never seen before, im not sure what shape exactly the object had,but it looked like a black dot,so i kept watching, then in about 3-4 minutes object stopped, then out of the same direction the 1st object came from,there were 2 objects,flying with same speed as 1st,they were flying lined up,1 behind another,but on the pretty long distance from each other,but they were lined up like there was an invisible rope between them,or something,looked pretty straight,i'v never seen anything like that,so i kept watching,trying to figure out what it was, 2 objects reached the first object,and the 4th object looked like 3 previous objects,came out of the same direction,so when the 4th object reached all 3 of them they lined up in a form of square, and stayed like that for about 5-6 minutes,making slightly movements,then they start moving and lined up as a triangle with 2 on the bottom,one as a top,and one above,it looked like a big arrow,made of 4 black dots,they stayed like that for few more minutes,then the next thing i know,2 from the bottom n 1 from top just disappeared,and only one left,then it slowly vanished,i kept looking into the sky,and after about 2 minutes,i'v seen 3 dots on pretty long distance from the place i spotted them first,and then they started to slowly disappear untill they are gone,i didn't have any camera device with me at the time,so i don't have any picture or video proof,but i know what i'v seen today,and it were unknowing flying objects,because i have know idea what was that,and where it came from...
